articles.title: 'In Paris it's about race, in Nigeria it's about gender': Singer Aṣa opens up about prejudice - CNN
articles.description: Superstar singer Aṣa has spoken about her battles against different types of prejudice in her home city, Paris, and the country she grew up in, Nigeria.
